com.edugility.liquibase.maven
Class AssembleChangeLogMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AbstractLiquibaseMojo
          com.edugility.liquibase.maven.AssembleChangeLogMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextEnabled, Mojo
@Mojo(name="assembleChangeLog",
      requiresDependencyResolution=TEST)
public class AssembleChangeLogMojo
extends AbstractLiquibaseMojo

Scans the test classpath in dependency order for Liquibase changelog fragments and assembles a master changelog that includes them all in dependency order.

Author:
Laird Nelson
See Also:
AbstractLiquibaseMojo

getChangeLogResources

public final Collection<? extends URL> getChangeLogResources()
                                                      throws ArtifactResolutionException,
                                                             DependencyGraphBuilderException,
                                                             IOException
Examines the current MavenProject's dependencies, resolving them if necessary, and assembles and returns a Collection whose elements are URLs representing reachable changelog fragments that are classpath resources.

This method may return null.

This method calls the getChangeLogResources(Iterable) method.

This method invokes the Artifacts.getArtifactsInTopologicalOrder(MavenProject, DependencyGraphBuilder, ArtifactFilter, ArtifactResolver, ArtifactRepository) method.

Returns:
a Collection of URLs to classpath resources that are changelog fragments, or null
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if the return value of AbstractLiquibaseMojo.getProject(), getDependencyGraphBuilder() or getArtifactResolver() is null
ArtifactResolutionException - if there was a problem resolving a given Artifact representing a dependency
DependencyGraphBuilderException - if there was a problem with dependency resolution
IOException - if there was a problem with input or output
See Also:
getChangeLogResources(Iterable), Artifacts.getArtifactsInTopologicalOrder(MavenProject, DependencyGraphBuilder, ArtifactFilter, ArtifactResolver, ArtifactRepository)

getChangeLogResources

public Collection<? extends URL> getChangeLogResources(Iterable<? extends Artifact> artifacts)
                                                throws IOException
Given an Iterable of Artifacts, and given a non-null, non-empty return value from the getChangeLogResourceNames() method, this method returns a Collection of URLs representing changelog resources found among the supplied Artifacts.

Parameters:
artifacts - an Iterable of Artifacts; may be null
Returns:
a Collection of URLs representing changelog resources found among the supplied Artifacts
Throws:
IOException - if an input/output error occurs such as the kind that might be thrown by the ClassLoader.getResources(String) method
See Also:
getChangeLogResourceNames(), ClassLoader.getResources(String)

getOutputFile

public File getOutputFile()
                   throws IOException
Validates the current File that represents the full path to the file that will result after the execute() method runs successfully and returns it.

This method may invoke File.mkdirs() and File.createNewFile() as part of its operation.

This method never returns null.

Returns:
the File that represents the full path to the file that will result after the execute() method runs successfully; never null
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if somehow the current File is a directory or if it is somehow null
IOException - if directory creation fails or if a new file whose pathname is described by the current output file could not be created or if a prior version of the file existed but could not be deleted

See Also:

execute

public void execute()
             throws MojoFailureException
Executes this AssembleChangeLogMojo by calling the assembleChangeLog() method.

Throws:
MojoFailureException - if an error occurs; under normal circumstances this goal will not fail so this method does not throw MojoExecutionException
TemplateSyntaxError - if the supplied template contained syntax errors
TemplateRuntimeError - if there was a problem merging the supplied Collection of URLs with the compiled version of the supplied template
See Also:
assembleChangeLog()

assembleChangeLog

public final void assembleChangeLog()
                             throws ArtifactResolutionException,
                                    DependencyGraphBuilderException,
                                    IOException
Assembles a Liquibase changelog from changelog fragments found in topological dependency order among the dependencies of the current project.

This method:

  • Verifies that there is a template that exists either in the project or (more commonly) in this plugin
  • Verifies that the template can be read and has contents
  • Retrieves and resolves the project's dependencies and sorts them in topological order from the artifact with the least dependencies to the current project (which by definition has the most dependencies)
  • Builds a ClassLoader that can "see" the Files associated with those Artifacts and uses it to find the specified changelog resources
  • Passes a Collection of URLs representing (in most cases) file: or jar: URLs through the MVEL template engine, thus merging the template and the URLs into an aggregating changelog
  • Writes the resulting changelog to the destination denoted by the outputFile parameter

Throws:
ArtifactResolutionException - if there was a problem resolving a given Artifact representing a dependency
DependencyGraphBuilderException - if there was a problem with dependency resolution
IOException - if there was a problem with input or output
See Also:
getChangeLogTemplateResource(), getChangeLogResources(), getOutputFile(), write(String, Collection, File)

write

public void write(String template,
                  Collection<? extends URL> urls,
                  File outputFile)
           throws IOException
Writes appropriate representations of the supplied URLs as interpreted and merged into the supplied template contents to the File represented by the outputFile parameter value.

Parameters:
template - an MVEL template; may be null in which case no action will be taken
urls - a Collection of URLs representing existing changelog fragment resources, sorted in topological dependency order; may be null in which case no action will be taken
outputFile - a File representing the full path to the location where an aggregate changelog should be written; may be null in which case no action will be taken; not validated in any way by this method
Throws:
IOException - if there was a problem writing to the supplied File
TemplateSyntaxError - if the supplied template contained syntax errors
TemplateRuntimeError - if there was a problem merging the supplied Collection of URLs with the compiled version of the supplied template
See Also:
getOutputFile(), getChangeLogResources(), getChangeLogResourceNames()
